review_data.title: A very interesting Japanese concept adapted to Swiss ingredients
review_data.content: Just as the title says: the traditional "Japanese tapas" concept but using local ingredients prepared and seasoned the Japanese way. Not really Japanese but tastes like it and is fine and interesting. Nice atmosphere, wide selection of dishes, fine preparation, reasonable prices, informal but efficient...More

review_data.title: Rock your world Brussels sprouts
review_data.content: This is the perfect Japanese tapas style place where meals are to be shared so everyone can enjoy multiple amazing creations.
